metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro)
You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Change Permissions Password Specifies a password you set that users must use in order to do any allowable printing or editing. Enable Text Access For Screen Reader Devices For The Visually Impaired Prevents or allows screen reader devices to read text. Available only when the PDF-compatibility is set to Acrobat 6.0 (PDF 1.5) or later.

Embed Index For Faster Search Creates an embedded index, which speeds up searches, especially when you convert large numbers of email messages or message folders. Show This Number Of Recent Archives (Outlook only) When converting email messages and folders, the Adobe PDF > [Convert Selected Messages and Convert Selected Folders] menus can list recently created PDFs to append. Show “Attach As Adobe PDF” Buttons If selected, the Attach As Adobe PDF button appears in the Outlook email message window.
Fill and Sign PDF Forms You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types of PDF forms
Fill and Sign PDF Forms You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat's Fill & Sign tool. Types of PDF forms

• Flat forms: These do not have interactive fields. You can complete the forms by entering information and adding your signatures. From the left panel, select Fill in form fields , and then select the field where you want to add text.
